Name: ABUL BASAR SHAIKH
Review:
I bought it at 18249/- but this is worst 😫 phone in this price. Plz don't buy it.


I rated to this phone: -Fingerprint sensor - 5/5Front Camera quality- 3.5/5Back Camera quality - 3.5/5Screen smoothness - 4.5/5Battery backup - 3.5/5Charging speed - 1.5/5Sound quality- 2/5Value for money- 2.5/51. Front Camera main agar normal photo khicho ge toh photo k over expose Kar de te hey...jiski bajase original photo nehi le pate hey.👎👎👎👎2. Jab main charger connect kartu hu (jab Mera phone mey 5% charge hota hey) to ek notification Ata hey ki charge 1hrs 40 min lekin 100% charge hone ke liye a 2hrs 30min se vi Jada time late hey..👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎3. Normal video call jab kartu hu toh 4 se 5 min bad automatically voice call ho jata hey a bahut Bara AK problem hey .👎👎👎4. Ph ke under settings may vi apko prblm mile ga jeise data(net) Kitna speed mey chal rahe hey o dekhne k liye koi settings nehi milega. 👎👎👎👎👎5. Jitna features dekha rahe hey utna features toh nehi milega .👎👎👎👎👎6. SABSE JADA ISSUE HEY IS PHONE KI ..ISKI SOUND QUALITY MAIN.. jab ap koi video or koi song sun rahe ho toh apko iski sound main problem dekhai dega...example deta hu..ap kisi or ph main like redmi,poco,realme..ph main low level sound main koi song or video jitna jore sun pawyuge ..is M52 main low level sound main apko kuch vi sunai nehi dega.. 👎👎👎👎Volume increase Karo gi toh Thora sunai deta hey...👎👎👎👎👎👎7. Volume high Karo gi toh fir vi problem dekhai deta hey iski sound main..High volume main kuch suno gi toh aisa feelings lagta hey ki ..kisine tuta huya box Baja raha hey....sound quality bekar hey 👎👎👎👎8. Ap kisi ko normal call krte ho..r loudspeaker dete ho r volume high nehi Karo ge toh ap ko 2nd person ki sound sunai nehi deta hey..toh a AK Bara issue hey..👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎👎9. Connectivity problem hey..wifi connection main problem hey ..Jada time wifi automatically off ho jata hey..connect krne ke bad vi..👎👎👎👎👎👎10. Ap apni data (wifi nehi) ko use karke YouTube main 4k,8k,or 12k video dekho ge toh dekhai deta hey jab ap 780p main dekho gi..lekin wifi main dekhai nehi deta hey..jab apki wifi ki speed mb main hota hey..👎👎👎👎👎Agar ap video quality ko increase Karo gi toh video nehi chale ga iss ph main..lekin kisi or ph main dekho gi toh high quality main vi o video chale ge..👎👎👎👎👎11. Dual  speakers nehi hey...iss price main toh koi or ph main dual speakers mil ta hey..fast charger vi milta hey..or bahut sare features bhi milta hey...12. 3.5mm ka headphone jak nehi hey.13. Battery backup is not good..100 se lekr 98 hone k liye 1hrs se bhi Jada time leta hey..a achi bat hey..👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍But use bad Jada charge jata hey Thora time main normal use krne se bhi...a AK issue hey..👎👎👎👎👎👎👎 ..main photo add Kiya hey dekh lijiye..Mera suggestion hey..plz don't buy this worst phone..ap apni paisa mat barbad kijiye is M52 ke liye....Main toh return k update kardiya..main return Kar Dunga........

Name: Dk Gautam
Review:
Read First then buy


Phone is good, Processor also working good, design is good, battery is working fine, but this phone should be under 23k only because camera is average. OK OK, Magnet sensor and NFC  also available in this.Phone lene ke baad regert jaise koi baat nhi hogi siwaye amount ko lekar. 23k se niche sahi hai SD778 ke sath. Bus.Nokia ki Dhajji udne se Samsung ke rate bhi Hawa me udne lage hai bus tab se.

Also Kai hatho se fisal Chuka hai but iski build quality achi hai so sreen damage nahi hua. Camara bhi acha hai. Battery life kafi achi hai. Summer mai hit nahi hota hai.

Name: Amazon Customer
